item.title: Python LSP - Thu Dec 18 15:27:15 UTC 2025
item.description:
This plugin enhances PyCharm with integrated support for ty, pyrefly, ruff, pyright, and base LSP tooling. It provides fast linting with ruff, precise type checking...
vendor: JetBrains s.r.o. downloads: 33 pricingModel: FREE xmlId: intellij.python.lsp
